message.content: {"id": "6536", "title": "Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing", "description": "When attempting to add Javadoc to a field in the Type Hierarchy view, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not perform any action. The expected behavior is that selecting this option should add Javadoc to the selected field. It is recommended to either remove this menu option or, preferably, fix the issue so that it adds Javadoc to the field.", "OB": "Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choose the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.", "EB": "After selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu should add Javadoc to the selected field.", "SR": "To reproduce the bug, select a field in the Type Hierarchy view."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '6536', 'title': 'Bug 6536Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'From its context menu select "Add Javadoc"== nothing happens.Either this menu should be removed or (preferably) the action should add thefields Javadoc. ', 'SR': 'Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view2. '}
